POLARIX

Introduction

Yang Donghwa is a South Korean singer-songwriter and producer under Bluedot Entertainment. He is a member of the upcoming Chinese-Korea boy group, POLARIX, formed through the survival show, Starlight Boys. He is a former pre-debut member of the boy group ATBO.

He made his solo debut on February 18, 2024, with the digital single "Blackout".

He is also known for participating in the survival shows “The Origin – A, B, OR What? and Starlight Boys.
